title: Great character development
review: I appreciate how they made sure to introduce each character before bringing them together for an epic fight to defend the Earth. It gives much more depth to each superhero.

title: Still as good as the first one
review: Here in this movie, we see more of the human side of Spider-Man and saw how this boy turned into a man trying his best to fulfill his responsibilities being a human and superhero at the same time.

title: Entertaining but not the best
review: Tobey Maguire isn't good at being bad. Don't get me wrong, he played a great Spider-Man in the first two films but he just isn't cut for being evil.

title: Amazing animation and visuals!
review: Sony really nails making character movement look detailed and pronounced.

title: Pretty good!
review: It's amazing how they were able to balance action and human element in this movie.

title: I liked the ending
review: To be honest, I got emotional seeing this movie on the big screen. Each actor delivered an outstanding performance and really contributed to the ending of the Avengers saga.

title: Still good superhero fun
review: I see a lot of negative reviews directed at the humor in this movie. All I can say is that Marvel, since the beginning, has used this same format for their movies so I don't understand why 'fans' are now criticizing the banter.
